title: Bandelier National Monument: Las Conchas Fire Recovery
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Nature     Wildland Fire     Las Conchas Fire Recovery                Las Conchas Fire Recovery       The Las Conchas Fire of 2011 heavily impacted much of Bandelier. Photo points taken year after year will document recovery of the burned area. Vegetation recovery is very important to wildlife survival, reduction in the threat of large scale flooding, and visitor safety. This information will be valuable in park planning for years to come.
